  %\VignetteIndexEntry{frame-calendar}
  %\VignetteEngine{knitr::rmarkdown}

grped_calendar <- pedestrian %>% 
  filter(Year == "2017", Month == "March") %>% 
  frame_calendar(x = Time, y = Hourly_Counts, date = Date_Time, sunday = TRUE)
